0.0.1.en:
Published device-id should not be changed when user rename the device.
Node name follows Homey's capability ID name exactly.

0.0.4.en: Update default configurations. Remove Devices tabs in configurations.

0.0.5.en: Adding MQTT Client library. Remove Settings tabs in configurations. Update metadata.

0.0.6.en: Integrated MQTT Client. No longer requires external MQTT Client app.
